main event: An unidentified object was observed via ground radar and visually by multiple witnesses in Claremont, California on July 4 and July 30, 1957.
interesting points: Observation by radar indicated a stationary object,Two male civilians reported seeing a bright, flashing object on August 16, 1957,The object appeared to move slowly and lacked typical aircraft features,The object was described as bright, oval-shaped, and caused shadows due to its brightness,The sighting involved multiple observations without any confirming physical evidence.
witness description: two male civilians and radar operator
